name: 英文（三）：藝術英文
restrict: ◎必須先修過【英文(一)】◎必須先修過【英文(二)】
description: 藉由閱讀及討論藝術相關主題之應文文章及多媒體素材強化學生英語溝通表達能力，以戀期藝術專業英語之知能及信心。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Course Description:**

Visual arts are not just for artists or professionals. This course will focus on how to develop aesthetics in daily life and learn to create arts with easy-to-follow steps. The instructor will introduce multiple forms of visual arts, including photography, sculpture, paintings, museums, and even videos and fashion. The students will learn to use English to describe their own creative projects and those of established artists.
